amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike title II, Health Insurance Market Stabilization.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 116-61 to strike title II, Health Insurance Market Stabilization.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McKinley amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 189 - 230 (Roll no. 210).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the McKinley amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 189 - 230 (Roll no. 210).
